author: schor
msg: no Jira, upgrade the annotations in the plugin mojo to modern form (old form was deprecated and generating a bunch of deprecated warnings during build).  No functional change.

author: sf
msg: Move initialization of the secret to the pre_config hook. Use
ap_retained_data_*() because we don't have access to process->pool there.
This makes the code shorter and a lot more clear, but cannot directly be
backported to 2.2 which doesn't have ap_retained_data_*().

author: jlboudart
msg: add showTransitive attribute on dependencyUpdateChecker task

author: mona
msg: OOZIE-1418 Fix bugs around ActionKillX not setting end time, V2SLAServlet and exception handling for event threads (mona)
